newsitem.title: USA: Gantos February same store sales fall.
newsitem.headline: Gantos February same store sales fall.

text.p: Gantos Inc said Thursday net same-store sales for the four-week period ended March 1 fell 12 percent from a year ago.
Net sales for the period were $11.3 million, a decrease of 12 percent.

"During February we experienced later-than-planned receipts of new inventory in two key categories, which impacted overall sales. In those departments where assortments were complete, results were positive. Despite the lower sales, the company maintained its margin discipline," said President and Chief Executive Officer Arlene Stern in a statement.
Gantos is a specialty retailer of women's wear and accessories. It operates 114 stores in 23 states.
